title: AI-linked fears roil stocks after years of hype, gains
description: Stocks surged to records in large part because of hope — and hype — about artificial intelligence.
content:
Stocks surged to records in large part because of hope — and hype — about artificial intelligence.

title: AI chip startup SambaNova raises $350 million in Vista-led round, signs Intel partnership
description: SambaNova Systems said on Tuesday it has raised $350 million in a new funding round and struck a partnership with Intel as it seeks to capitalise on surging demand for inference chips used in artificial intelligence applications.
content:
Feb 24 (Reuters) - SambaNova Systems said on Tuesday it has raised $350 million in a new funding round and struck a partnership with Intel as it seeks to capitalise on surging demand for inference chips used in artificial intelligence applications.

title: Hegseth warns Anthropic to let the military use the company’s AI tech as it sees fit, AP source says
description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth gave Anthropic’s CEO a Friday deadline to open the company’s artificial intelligence technology for unrestricted military use or risk losing its government contract, according to a person familiar with their meeting Tuesday
content: WASHINGTON (AP) — Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth gave Anthropic’s CEO a Friday deadline to open the company’s artificial intelligence technology for unrestricted military use or risk losing its government contract, according to a person familiar with... [6022 chars]

title: AI as Emotional Support: New Research Suggests Technology May Trigger “Happiness Hormones”
description: Artificial intelligence has evolved: it transitioned from a specialized tool to a part of our daily lives. Now, it’s a mainstream resource used by everybody to lessen the burden of study or work. Though a recent study by Edubrain shows that there may be even more happening. title: Anthropic digs in heels in dispute with Pentagon, source says
description: Artificial intelligence lab Anthropic has no intention of easing its usage restrictions for military purposes, a person familiar with the matter said on Tuesday, following a meeting to discuss its future with the Pentagon.
content: NEW YORK, Feb 24 (Reuters) - Artificial intelligence lab Anthropic has no intention of easing its usage restrictions for military purposes, a person familiar with the matter said on Tuesday, following a meeting to discuss its future with the Pentagon... [894 chars]

title: Pentagon Threatens to End Anthropic Work in Feud Over AI Terms
description: The Pentagon warned Anthropic PBC that it would terminate the company’s military contracts on Friday if the artificial intelligence startup failed to meet government terms for use of its technology, according to people familiar with the matter.

title: Traders Dump Software Loans as AI Concerns Weigh on Debt Prices
description: Leveraged-loan traders are slashing their exposure to software debt — much of which entered 2026 priced at or near par — in a sign of how artificial-intelligence fears are rippling across the market.
content:
Leveraged-loan traders are slashing their exposure to software debt — much of which entered 2026 priced at or near par — in a sign of how artificial-intelligence fears are rippling across the market.
